roleset.name: to produce in large numbers, to give rise to
roleset.note: SPAWN-V NOTES: Based on sentences in WSJ. Member of VNcls engender-27, calve-28. (from spawn.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Last year 's appeals court decision , for instance , spawned several suits , reportedly including a recent action by the heirs of singer Bobby Darin against McDonald 's Corp. over its `` Mac Tonight '' TV commercials , a rough parody of Mr. Darin 's `` Mack the Knife '' trademark .
example.arg: several suits , reportedly including a recent action by the heirs of singer Bobby Darin against McDonald 's Corp. over its `` Mac Tonight '' TV commercials , a rough parody of Mr. Darin 's `` Mack the Knife '' trademark
